summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6014 for the improvement of 12th Avenue Northeast from East 88th Street to approximately 145 feet north of East 92nd Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 81139, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
